snippet.title: Skull and Bones: Ship Combat, Customization, and Progression Gameplay
snippet.description: Skull and Bones launches on November 8 on PS5, Xbox Series X|S, and PC via Ubisoft Connect. Your journey to become the most infamous pirate in the Indian Ocean starts now. To learn more about the game’s new direction including new details about ship customization, PVP combat, crafting, and progression we spoke with Senior Game Director Ryan Barnard.
